properties.name: mpesa.paybill
properties.description: This is the organization's shortcode (Paybill or Buygoods - A 5 to 6-digit account number) used to identify an organization and receive the transaction.

properties.name: mpesa.callback.url
properties.description: A CallBack URL is a valid secure URL that is used to receive notifications from M-Pesa API. It is the endpoint to which the results will be sent by M-Pesa API.

properties.name: mpesa.passkey
properties.description: A secret credential given by Mpesa for each app

properties.name: mpesa.consumer.secret
properties.description: A secret credential given by Mpesa for each app

properties.name: mpesa.consumer.key
properties.description: A secret credential given by Mpesa for each app

properties.name: mpesa.stkpush.url
properties.description: The endpoint to be used to send the stkpush request to safaricom

properties.name: mpesa.oauth.url
properties.description: The endpoint to be used to authenticate all mpesa api operations
